case.name: Identity reveal
case.description: Gwen removed her spider mask, revealing her identity

trigger.state: Honestly, the mask breathes really well. Part of me wonders if I shouldn't have saved it for last... I guess I'm a bit limited on my gimmicks, heh?
Okay. So, that's probably the worst part of tonight over.

case.name: Web masturbation
case.description: Gwen is masturbating while swinging from a web.

trigger.state: You haven't lived until you've tried it like this.

state.i: Swinging from the ceiling, feeling the love~

trigger.state: It's just so easy to cut loose.
I feel like I'm flying! I mean, it's close, but UNF!
Ahahaha, woo! This is more fun than mashing double bass drums!

case.name: Partial strip
case.description: Gwen only pulls down the top half of her costume to strip instead of removing the whole thing.

trigger.state: Don't take that as a meaning you're gonna get into them, ~player~.
Okay, hope you're having fun, folks.
